about-me.title: About Me
content: In today's world, there is no limit to what one can learn. With the vast amount of information available, it is possible to find answers to almost any question or to draw conclusions based on the available data.

However, the key to success lies not only in acquiring knowledge but also in refining one's thought process. The better one becomes at learning, the more knowledge they can amass. By focusing on developing our ability to learn, we can unlock our full potential and achieve great things.

front-end.title: Front End Development
description: I focus on creating functional/responsive designs
Frameworks that I use: React, Vue
For styling I prefer to use tailwindcss or bootstrap -- I prefer not to write css

back-end.title: Back End Development
description: Personally I prefer backend -- using logic and manipulating data makes more sense to me
Languages I've used for backend: JavaScript, TypeScript (node.js), C#, Java, PHP

mobile-development.title: Mobile Application Development
description: I have little experience with creating mobile applications using xamarin (C#)

database.title: Database
description: Working on the backend usually requires data to be stored as well
So for data manipulation/storage I have become experienced with SQL (Postgres, Oracle, MySQL, SQLite)

dev-ops.title: DevOps
description: Automation is one of my core values -- I do not like repetitive tasks
I have learned to create CI/CD pipelines to automate building and testing/linting code

server-management.title: Server Management
description: To host applications I've utilized my old pc as a server (RHEL based -- CentOS, AlmaLinux)
I use it to host samba (SMB), ArchiSteamFarm, and some of my own applications (Discord Server Bot)

contact-page.title: Contact
contact-page.contact-me: Feel free to send me an e-mail

forms.subject: subject
